title: Karma Waters - Danang
typeOfFood: Vegan, Indian, Western, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Vietnamese
description: Vegan restaurant with English speaking staff and menus, free Wi-Fi. No MSG or sugar added, and no alcohol. Has gluten-free muffins, cakes, and bread; most dishes are gluten-free. Raw vegan menu available. Serves both Western (French press) and Vietnamese coffee. Also hosts vegan cooking classes, responsible tours and homestay. Moved from 113/10 Nguyen Chi Thanh in 2014.
